snippet.title: Sonic: Fan Games/Hacks 413: Sonic The Last Strike (SAGE2003-RAGE2007)
snippet.description:
(These are my simple game play videos)
(I can and will remove specific videos if its necessary/requested)

Name: Sonic The Last Strike - SAGE2003 & RAGE2007
Credit: Super Napalm
Release Date: Possibly 2002-2007

My Website: https://scaleyfoxy.weebly.com/

Download: Only on Site.

(Demo 1)
00:00:00 - Title
00:00:59 - Cutscene 1
00:01:18 - Beam Chase Zone
00:02:17 - Cutscene 2
00:03:16 - Boss
00:03:39 - Ending&Credits

(V4)
00:05:53 - Logo&Title
00:06:23 - Cutscene 1
00:07:14 - Zone 1
00:08:35 - Credits

(V0.2)
00:10:02 - Logo&Title
00:11:02 - Cutscene 1
00:11:33 - City Chase
00:13:29 - Cutscene 2
00:13:47 - Space Station Zone
00:15:28 - Credits

(Demo 2)
00:16:05 - Logo&Title
00:16:31 - Cutscene 1
00:17:03 - City Chase
00:18:19 - Cutscene 2/Sky Chase Zone
00:20:09 - Credits

(Full)
00:20:53 - Logo&Title
00:21:34 - Cutscene 1
00:22:06 - City Chase
00:23:34 - Cutscene 2/Sky Chase Zone
00:25:17 - Cutscene 3/Boss 1
00:26:19 - Cutscene 4
00:27:21 - Space Chase Zone
00:29:50 - Cutscene 5
00:30:17 - Space Station Zone
00:33:38 - Cutscene 6/Boss 2
00:34:50 - Cutscene 7
00:35:48 - Final Boss
00:37:11 - Ending
00:38:30 - Credits
00:40:22 - Game Over

(Remix)
00:40:58 - Boot&Stuff
00:42:07 - Cutscene 1
00:42:55 - City Chase
00:44:42 - Cutscene 2/Sky Chase Zone
00:46:27 - Cutscene 3/Boss 1
00:47:28 - Cutscene 4
00:48:30 - Space Chase Zone
00:51:00 - Cutscene 5
00:51:29 - Space Station Zone
00:53:55 - Cutscene 6/Boss 2
00:55:11 - Cutscene 7
00:56:11 - Final Boss
00:57:26 - Ending
00:58:53 - Credits

(EXTRA)
01:01:32 - Investigating the MIDI of City Chase.

NOTES: It's the FINAL STRIKEDOWN!...
In a world where life was young and seemed so wonderful...
A miracle, oh it was beautiful & Magical...
SCOOTE-... SOOONIC!
Anyway... My "Final Logical" randomness aside.
We now take a look at yet another game by Napalm known as Last Strike.
So this game supposedly got started around 2002 and finished somewhere in 2003.
Then later in 2006 it gor a Remix version which is the same game with slightly tweaked engine and music changes.
And little bit more story context and visuals.
And ultimately it made an appearance in "RAGE2007 Expo Part 2" for supposedly being bad enough to deserve that spot.
To which I'm... not at a 100% agreement on.
I do not believe this game is "RAGE" quality to deserve to appear there, sure it's not perfect,
but I don't think its RAGE Expo levels of imperfect.
So in this game a new evil force is plotting to destroy Mobius alongside with Sonic.
That being said the final boss is way too easy.
Physics wise this game is functional side from some minor moments but for the most part the game is fully playable.
Side from maybe one possible crash/bug.
You can't die to the enemies in Remix City Chase either.
Overall it may be a bit clunky but definitely not the worst.

(ISSUES)

1. Space Station on the full game may crash like it did as seen in the video.
2. In the Remix version death can skip to final boss.
3. In the Remix version the cutscene assets remain intact during Space Chase.
4. City Chase MIDI in "0.2 & Demo 2" will not play correctly.
I showed how it would sound, it is not the same MIDI that got used in the final build.

(PASSWORDS)

chips
end
bombboom
oopps
finalfan
gameover
BOSS2
finlboss
boss1
hithere
